definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc

sentences.english: The manner of folding a letter, for example, may embody a studied affront.
sentences.chinese: 比如信紙的折法，稍有不慎，就會被當做故意冒犯。

sentences.english: G My computer is broken so I have to use notepaper .
sentences.chinese: 我的電腦壞了，因此我只好使用信紙。

sentences.english: When people wanted to send a letter, they would close the paper with a seal.
sentences.chinese: 當人們想寄信時，他們會在信紙上蓋封口章。

sentences.english: This must is an official order it is write on the company's notepaper .
sentences.chinese: 它被寫在公司的信紙上，這肯定是經過批准的命令。

sentences.english: If you fold the letter in two, it will fit into the envelope.
sentences.chinese: 你要是把信紙對摺，就可以裝進信封了。

sentences.english: Can you read the addresses embossed on the notepaper?
sentences.chinese: 你能看出凸印在信紙上的地址嗎？

sentences.english: This must be an official order - it is wrote on the company's notepaper .
sentences.chinese: 它被寫在公司的信紙上，這肯定是經過批准的命令。

sentences.english: Eyeing the four-inch-thick wad of paper, I felt a wave of despair.
sentences.chinese: 望着這沓足足十公分厚的信紙，我忽然認爲一陣失望。

sentences.english: This is a letter paper personalized with his initials.
sentences.chinese: 這是一張有他姓名首字母的信紙。

sentences.english: The quality and provenance of your writing paper is like a secret code.
sentences.chinese: 信紙的質量和產地似乎成了一種密碼。

sentences.english: He had written letters on official notepaper to promote a relative's company.
sentences.chinese: 他用官方信紙寫信推薦一個親戚的公司。

sentences.english: Most of it was burned, but the bottom of one page was not burned.
sentences.chinese: 大部分信已燒焦了，只有一頁信紙的底端還未被燒盡。

sentences.english: It's on royally headed paper and is signed by one of the Queen's Ladies in Waiting!
sentences.chinese: 信紙上邊有皇家的標誌，而且有女王侍從的簽名。

sentences.english: The ideal size is about the area of a piece of A4 or US Letter sized paper.
sentences.chinese: 理想的尺寸大約是一張A4或者美國信紙那麼大。

sentences.english: I tore open the self-addressed, stamped envelope and unfolded the single sheet of paper inside.
sentences.chinese: 我撕開回郵信封，展開裏面一頁單薄的信紙。

definition: felt-tip pen/roller ball pen/gel ink pen
(Tw) (publishing) belly band (paper sash around a book, outside the dust jacket)
